message.body: I'm nervous. From the sudden silence after my text, did those biznitches say happy birthday? Cause I'll cut em if they didn't.

I didn't receive anything from that group message since my data is temporarily turned off. So I don't know what was said! Phuong texted last night. Sam did just now. Haha. Thanks for having my back :)
Sam said that she was able to do something this weekend and Phuong said something like yeah we should. I just said I assumed we'd be doing something for your bday.
Oh. Ok. I guess we'll see then. It just sucks that it's supposed to be so humid tomorrow like today and it might rain. Sunday's going be beautiful.
Have you ever been to Soho Wings?
Can't say that I have. Sorry. I think my sister has.

Oh that's ok. They're really good. But it's out near Glenside. It was a thought if we didn't know where to go if did go out. But I'm not sure if I'm really in the mood for them anyway. But we need go sometime!
My sister said and I quote, "deliciouuuuussss"
Haha. Yes.
I hope we can just stay indoors this weekend. It will be way too hot. I can't deal with all of this. Haha.
I know. I hear you.
Hold on, whys your data off?

I only get 300mb a month. We stayed at Michelle's last weekend to watch shadow and Michael used my phone to watch YouTube. Then left it running in the background all night. So it used up 90% of my data. So I have until the fifteenth until I can turn it back on so I'm not charged $20.
Ohhhhh I see!! That sucks!
Yup.
Would you maybe want to do lunch on Sunday and hang out for a little? I don't want to pitch the idea if you don't want to do it.
Yeah. I sort of just wanted to take it easy on Sunday and prepare for work. You know how I get. Haha.
Okay! Not a problem. I'm the same way.
So tomorrow?
Yeah. I guess so.
We can always do it another time, but I won't be able to go next Saturday (Courtney's visiting) or the following weekend (mikes birthday)
Yeah. It's ok. However it works out Its fine. I'm actually not really into my birthday this year for some reason. It's not a big deal. We shall see how tomorrow goes.
K
